metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In GraphicsMagick 1.3.27, there is an infinite loop and application hang inthe ReadBMPImage function (coders/bmp.c). Remote attackers could leveragethis vulnerability to cause a denial of service via an image file with acrafted bit-field mask value.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
